entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (mtp_meatlump_king.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_11: I almost asked if it was because you were most glorious.
entries.s_12: You are astute and wise beyond what your otherwise dreary countenance would suggest. Make yourself at home in my Empire.
entries.s_14: Being glorious isn't a basis for government. How about we vote?
entries.s_16: Hush you. And begone from my sight before I have you thrown in jail like a common droid.
entries.s_25: It's amazing how the colors of the real world only seem truly real when you see them in my coat.
entries.s_26: Too many Meatlumps think I'm a concept, or I complete them, or I'm gonna make them alive. But I've got my own peace of mind. I don't need yours and won't give you mine.
entries.s_27: Maybe in these moments I love life more than I ever had before. Not just my life...anybody's life...your life. All I want are the same answers anybody wants. Where did I come from? Where am I going? How long have I got? Could I have a bite of that meatlump?
entries.s_28: Now watch closely, everyone. I'm going to show you how to eat a meatlump. A meatlump of meat and lumpiness. The trick is not to fear it. Or to chew.
entries.s_29: These rugs really tie the room together.
entries.s_30: Once, not long ago, I dropped my meatlump into a river. When I tried to get it back, I fell in. I thought I'd drown, but the water carried me to the shore. From then on, I always ate my snacks away from water.
entries.s_31: Anyone who spends a significant amount of time with me finds me quite agreeable. Just ask...well anybody.
entries.s_33: What CorSec has never figured out, and what I know well, is that these Meatlumps would never break, never lie down, never bend over for anybody. Anybody. Well, other than for me.
entries.s_35: This hideout demonstrates one of the great dangers of being a Meatlump. Not to life and limb...what could possibly harm a Meatlump? I'm talking about excess anger.
entries.s_37: I must admit I didn't think much of you the first time I laid eyes on you; looked like a stiff breeze would blow you over. I'm still working on my second impression.
entries.s_39: Look, I don't mean to be rude but being Meatlump King is not as easy as it looks, so I'd appreciate it if you wouldn't distract me.
entries.s_4: Ah, a new Meatlump. Welcome. I am the King.
entries.s_41: I live my life. I don't apologize for taking care of my Meatlumps. And I refused to be a fool dancing on the strings held by any of those Imperial or Rebel big shots. That's my life and I don't apologize for that.
entries.s_43: I do not seek to rule the entire Galaxy...unlike others I will not bother to name [*wink*]. I merely seek my own sanctuary, down here below Coronet, where I might find peace.
entries.s_44: These chambers and tunnels are my Empire, though it is most definitely not divided. All Meatlumps are welcome here.
entries.s_6: How did you become King of the Meatlumps?
entries.s_8: I was the first. When I started, I was the only one. Though back then, the name meatlump only referred to a delicious snack. It was Draykken who  named us Meatlumps! But even so, it is only right that I am King. For I am the tallest and the most glorious.
